channel.title: [pi] custom client compiler error
channel.description:
i get this error when i compile
[code]javac:file not found *.java usage:javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [pi] custom client compiler error
item.dc:creator: @desion desion
item.description:
@desion wrote:

[quote=“barelydead owner, post:1, topic:360753”]i get this error when i compile

javac:file not found *.java usage:javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You either do not have the latest version of java development kit (JDK), Java (JRE), or do not have your have your java environment variables setup correctly. Refer this this guide by clicking Here. Hope this helps.

Read full topic
